item.title: The secrets of cork: So much more than a bottle stopper
item.description: The sound of a bottle popping may be a familiar harbinger of good, but the humble material behind the pop has more uses than you might imagine.

item.title: New Jersey drone sightings now prompt calls for state of emergency
item.description: A New Jersey state senator is calling for a limited state of emergency over the mysterious drones that have been seen flying over New York and Jersey.

item.title: Judge rejects bankruptcy sale of Alex Jones' Infowars to The Onion

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO was likely killed with a ghost gun that can be made at home
